@graph.description:
Submitting SARS-CoV-2 sequences to ENA

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Submitting sequence data to ENA](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/galaxy-interface/tutorials/upload-data-to-ena/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
